name: A Keepy Uppy 3D: Kick Ups - The Best Super Soccer Ball Juggling Football Skills Game 2014
name_original: A Keepy Uppy 3D: Kick Ups - The Best Super Soccer Ball Juggling Football Skills Game 2014
description:
How Long Can You Keep The Soccer Ball in the Air!?

The ultimate finger football skills test. Control the soccer ball with your finger to get the best Keepy Uppy score.

FEATURES:

• Amazingly Realistic Soccer Ball Physics
• Portrait & Landscape Modes - Just tilt your device
• Utterly Simple, Addicting, Fun!
• Challenge your friends to beat your high score

Download NOW 100% FREE - Kick Off Time!
